
```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

```

```{r}
eq<-lm(Temp~Ozone,data=airquality)
eq
summary(lm(Ozone ~ Temp, airquality))$r.squared
```

```{r}
ggplot(airquality, aes(x=Ozone, y=Temp)) +ggtitle("Ozone and Temperature",subtitle = "r^2=0.488") + geom_point() + geom_smooth(method="lm",formula=y~x) + theme_bw()+ theme(panel.grid = element_blank(), panel.border = element_blank(), axis.line = element_line(colour="Black"), plot.title = element_text(size=rel(1.5), hjust = 0.5), plot.subtitle = element_text(size=rel(1.2), hjust = 0.5))
```
